sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Children's Mental
Children's Mental Health Partnership; Children's Mental Health Plan.
sections.text: Children's Mental Health Partnership; Children's Mental Health Plan.

sections.heading: Office of Mental Health services.
sections.text:
The Office of Mental Health
within the Department of Human Services shall allow grant and
purchase-of-service
moneys to be used for services for children from birth through age 18.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text:
This Act takes effect upon
becoming law.
